duties_responsibilities.duty: Support and coach staff in the preschool center
Offer premium customer service to parents and families
Ensure the highest quality of care for children in the center
Manage the enrollment of new children
Offer support to the director as needed
Be a positive leader with a heart-centered approach

education_certification.credential: B.A. or A.A, or equivalent experience, with at least 12 ECE Units required
3 years of early childhood teaching experience required
1 year of educational leadership experience preferred
